# RoomBuilder.BuildError.invalidInput

**Case**

An error that indicates the framework encounters invalid captured room data.

## Declaration

```swift
case invalidInput
```

## Interpreting the error cause

- **RoomBuilder.BuildError.insufficientInput**: An error that indicates the framework expects more captured room data.
- **RoomBuilder.BuildError.exceedSceneSizeLimit**: An error that indicates when the scene size grows past the framework’s limitations.
- **RoomBuilder.BuildError.internalError**: An error that indicates when the framework encounters an unexpected error case.
- **RoomBuilder.BuildError.deviceNotSupported**: An error that indicates that the framework doesn’t support the user’s device.
